#summary A list of use cases for the system.

=Actors and Goals=

==Actors: User==
Goals: Login, Setup Account, Edit personal information

==Actor: Administrator==
Goals: Login, Manage users, generate reports, export to excel

=Use Cases=
*Use Case: Login*

ID: UC1

Description: Provides authentication for the website.

Precondition: The user is not currently logged in.

  # View the Login page.
  # Enter the user name and password.
  # Press the Login Button.
  # If the user's name and password are valid.
    # Login the user.
  # Else
    # Return the user to the Login page where a message is displayed about incorrect username or password.

Postcondition: The user is authenticated.


*Use Case: Setup Account*

ID: UC2

Description: A new user sets up an account and puts in their information.

Precondition: 
  * Administrator has already added the user with the New User use case.
  * The User has never logged in before.

  # Recieve user name and password in email
  # Click on the link in the email to jump to the login page
  # Authenticate with the Login Use Case.
  # Enter into the first time setup page
  # Enter a new password and press submit

Postconditions: The user is at the personal information page.
